Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Anubis/Koga Shuko/Unitron:




Scattershot and Nemesis Enforcer transformed, heading for the Ark.

---

Dark One looked to Zardus.  "Attack the Ark?  I take it you mean help defend 
it.  I accept the proposal for a bonus.  But, when I do get back, we WILL get 
payed, and then we will discuss our contract.  I suggest telling the Maximals 
via com, they may be unsure, due to the fighting that broke out."

Dark One lead the other four Oblitercons outside, all of them heading for the 
Ark.

===

Sixshot, immobilized, went into stasis lock as a rocket hit him.

---

Koga Shuko grunted, slamming to the ground.  Laser blasts hit him, but 
luckily his scales were strongest in his beast mode.  "Koga Shuko, 
transform." he commanded, going to robot mode with his laser rifle in hand.  
Firing two bolts from the laser at Prowl, he fired three optic blasts off at 
Rhinox at the same time.

---

Unitron raised both rifles, firing 3 bolts off from each, a total of six 
laser bolts heading for Sniper's abdomen.

---

Anubis fired three plasma bolts from his rifle, one heading for the back of 
Prowl's left knee, the rest at the Ark.
